name: Gatling Bytes
description:
Gatling Bytes is a shooter game set in a distant future where robots have gone wild and aggressive because of a computer virus spread accidentally by a hacker. 

Humanity is on the brink of extinction, however, Gon Gatling, an ex-soldier decided to go to combat and fight the wild robots to save humanity.

Dev Loper, the hacker who accidentally spreads the virus,  has decided to join Gon in the war using his hacking skills to atone for his mistakes of spreading the virus.

Humanity's future lies in the hands of these two. Will they succeed or will they fail?

Game Controls:

WASD  - For movement 

SpaceBar - Jump

Left-Mouse click - Shoot/Fire

Key "1" - Switch to Pistol Weapon (Unli ammo)

Key "2" - Switch to Rifle Weapon (Ammo needs to be crafted)

Q = Hacking mode (Need to collect RAM loot - can be crafted/dropped by Big Red Robot)

E = Crafting mode(Need to collect Tools loot - can be crafted/dropped by Small Robot).

Hacking mode - you can enter hacking mode if you have RAM loot check HUD in the upper left with RAM icon. During hacking mode, you will play a signal match game that will pop up. If the signals match, a nearby enemy will be captured and will self-destruct. 

Crafting mode - you can enter hacking mode if you have TOOLS loot check HUD in the upper left with the wrench & screwdriver icon. During crafting mode,  Gunner can't shoot and Hacker will activate the auto-fire mode. You can only move the gunner using WASD & rotate by pressing Wheel-mouse-button and mouse drag. In crafting mode, a match 3 memory game will pop up. If you successfully match 3 pairs, loot will be crafted. Loots can be in the form of ammo, RAM, tools, and health loot. In the event, that there will be no 3 matching pairs, press ESC to exit the crafting mini-game.
